My Travel Timeline

From my first solo adventure to becoming a recognized travel expert, here's how my journey unfolded.

2018

The Journey Begins

Started my first solo backpacking trip across Southeast Asia, discovering my passion for travel photography and storytelling.

2019

First Travel Blog

Launched The Sunday Traveller blog, sharing authentic travel experiences and practical tips with fellow adventurers.

2020

Digital Nomad Life

Embraced remote work and became a full-time digital nomad, exploring 15 countries while building my online presence.

2021

Travel Photography Awards

Won multiple international travel photography competitions and started offering photography workshops.

2022

Published Travel Guide

Released my first comprehensive travel guide book, becoming a bestseller in the travel category.

2023

Global Recognition

Featured in major travel publications and invited as a keynote speaker at international travel conferences.

Why I Travel

Travel isn't just about visiting new places—it's about connecting with people, understanding different cultures, and discovering parts of yourself you never knew existed.

Every journey teaches me something new, whether it's learning to cook traditional dishes with local families, navigating ancient temples, or simply sharing stories with fellow travelers around a campfire.

Through my blog and photography, I aim to inspire others to step out of their comfort zones and experience the transformative power of travel.
